attributes.action: "Falmouth For Orders" Dredging A Deep Water Channel In Falmouth Harbour
attributes.additional_details:
FALMOUTH FOR ORDERS CAMPAIGN

We want the government to fully support the dredging of Falmouth Harbour.

This will secure the future of the Ship Repair Yard, and will also bring new opportunities into the harbour i.e.;- renewable energy, cruise line business, cargo handling.

It will also help Cornwall as a whole, with the Cruise liners bringing tourists to the area. And safeguarding employment, and creating opportunities for Apprenticeships in the Ship Yard.
